name: Blowy Fish
description: Blowy Fish is an animated 2D physics platformer with slingshot controls. Pull a grumpy blowfish by its tail to make it jump forward through increasingly difficult levels or compete for high scores in classic endless mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 1 Ghz Single Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: please add dan halen hair to the collectibles
